entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries or periods of freezing drizzle beginning near noon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. Temperature steady near minus 1. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries or periods of freezing drizzle ending in the evening then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 16 May 2016
